fields.title: Affected By Griefing Rule
fields.description: If true, whether the goal is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

fields.title: Blocks
fields.description: Block descriptors for which blocks are valid to be taken by the entity, if empty all blocks are valid.

fields.title: Can Take
fields.description: Filters for if the entity should try to take a block. Self and Target are set.

fields.title: Chance
fields.description: Chance each tick for the entity to try and take a block.

fields.title: Take
fields.description: Trigger ran if the entity does take a block. Self, Target, and Block are set.

fields.title: Requires Line Of Sight
fields.description: If true, whether the entity needs line of sight to the block they are trying to take.

fields.title: Xz Range
fields.description: XZ range from which the entity will try and take blocks from.

fields.title: y Range
fields.description: Y range from which the entity will try and take blocks from.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.

description: AI goal that makes entities pick up blocks from the world, like Endermen grabbing blocks to carry. Configure which blocks the entity can take and the search radius. Works with place_block behavior to create entities that relocate blocks or harvest materials from the environment.
